title: Verify Exchange/Gmail E2E flow with DLP Rule  by selecting Email Subject - Policy match
custom_steps:
1. Go to Policies - > DLP - > EDIT RULES -> Data Loss Prevention 
2. Select Email Subject only
3. Add custom DLP profile to Email Outbound RT policy with all Destination apps supported (eg. exchange, gmail, custom msa)
4. Send the email traffic with DLP content in email subject
5. verify policy and dlp alert generated
6. Verify Incident generated
custom_expected:
Verify email received correctly
verify policy and dlp alert generated as expected 
Verify Incident generated
Verify no service crash
